Title: God Johnson
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jason Ning, Mike Costa (story editor), Chris Rafferty (story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: When a grisly murder takes place at an insane asylum, the prime suspect calls himself God. Lucifer, unsure this may be his father, tries to find the real killer.
